DataElement.preferredName: Person Human Immunodeficiency Virus FAHI Total Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the total score of an individual assessed with the Functional Assessment of HIV Infection (FAHI) questionnaire.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Functional Assessment of Human Immunodeficiency Virus Infection Result
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Person; a human being._The virus isolated and recognized as the etiologic agent of AIDS. HIV-1 is classified as a lentivirus, a subtype of retroviruses._A questionnaire designed to measure the quality of life of adults living with HIV infection. This instrument is based on the FACT-G questionnaire._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._The result of an action.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Human immunodeficiency virus. Species of LENTIVIRUS, subgenus primate lentiviruses (LENTIVIRUSES, PRIMATE), formerly designated T-cell lymphotropic virus type III/lymphadenopathy-associated virus (HTLV-III/LAV). It is acknowledged to be the agent responsible for the acute infectious manifestations, neurologic disorders, and immunologic abnormalities linked to the ACQUIRED IMMUNODEFICIENCY SYNDROME.:Person; a human being.

Concepts.definition: The virus isolated and recognized as the etiologic agent of AIDS. HIV-1 is classified as a lentivirus, a subtype of retroviruses.

Property.preferredName: Functional Assessment of Human Immunodeficiency Virus Infection Outcome
Property.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to measure the quality of life of adults living with HIV infection. This instrument is based on the FACT-G questionnaire.:The result of an action.

Concepts.longName: Functional Assessment of Human Immunodeficiency Virus Infection

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElement.changeDescription: Functional Assessment of HIV Infection (revised; Peterman, Cella, Mo, & McCain, 1997) subdomain and total scores collected.  Curated to support NCI CCR HIV trial.
